title: SnoopApe
author: SnoopApe
created_time: August 03, 2022, 08:18:08 PMLast edit: August 04, 2022, 08:45:54 AM by SnoopApe
content: SnoopApeA Crypto DeFi Project for generate Passive Income and help the development of other projectsâ€œOur motto is to have everything completed before launch with no false promises!â€SnoopApe is A revolutionary Ecosystem developed with the latest Web3 technology catered specifically for passive income by holding SnoopApe, holders will receive USDC as a reward.SnoopApe team has worked in total silence for approximately 5 months, drafting out a study plan and the most crucial part was the development of our dApp.SnoopApe was born for fun by observing most of the mistakes that many tokens on BSC and ETH have made in the past year.I then told myself that our starting point should be to have everything ready before launch such as our dapp and the study of 15 different tokenomics.SnoopApe team will be providing their investors a platform with functions such as:Home Center with reward trakers, news and chartStakingNFT MintNFT StakingSwapPrivate SaleTokenomics:Total Supply: 100.000.000.000PrivateSale: 3.5%PreSale: 25.5%LP: 13.5%Staking: 25%Development: 2.5%Locked for Staking & CEX: 20%Burn: 10%Tax Distribution:Buy/Sell Tax: 10%Wallet Transfers: 0%USDC Rewards: 5%AutoLP: 1%Marketing: 3%Dev: 1%[STAKING]SnoopApe offers a revolutionary staking system with fixed APY. User have the option to enter a pool and lock their tokens inside for a duration of 30 or 60 days.The APY value correlates with lock duration hence a longer lock period will yield a higher APY.It is possible to claim (harvest) the farmed tokens within the staking platform once the lock period has been fulfilled.User who wishes to continue staking and reinvesting may choose to compound the farmed tokens at any given time which in return would increase the APY.Our staking platform is also designed to gain passive income in USDC from SnoopApeâ€™s daily trading volume.[NFT MINT]SnoopApe was born with a very specific objective that is to offer users with 360-degree services.Upon consideration, we decided that SnoopApe should also incorporate great NFT Utilities.Our NFTs were designed with passion and besides looking fantastic, they also give the possibility of providing a return on investment with passive income all from staking.The total Supply of SnoopApe NFTs is 10K[NFT STAKING]Staking of NFT(s) is one of the hot spots on our dashboard.Mint an NFTs right away and stake them for awesome rewards and passive income.â€¦Okâ€¦ But When Launch/WL/PrivateSale ?Before we officially kickstart this project, there will be a round of private sale for whitelisted wallets in which all funds collected will be used for marketing activities prior to our public presale on Pinksale.Private sale will be held once the community is more established and mature.The application for private sale WL is open now so please fell free to complete the ðŸ‘‰Google form here https://forms.gle/361NHxozFJ1yb2d46 and we will keep you updated once we finalize the date.What other long-term benefits after launch?One of our future direction now is to provide a one-stop solution for upcoming ERC20 projects.We are in the midst of developing a sort of launchpad which enables new projects to integrate functions such as Staking, NFT Minting or NFT Staking seamlessly and effortlessly into their existing project ecosystem where they would be able to receive a ready-to-use source codes (generic or customized version) to be integrated into their website.A Sneak Peek of comments.author: AmoreJaz
comments.body: as you have a lot of competitors in this chosen industry, do you think you can still get sufficient clients to survive in this competitive market? nft, staking, dapps >> basically everyone is deploying these features. and let's admit, only few will survive to achieve years of operation. how long do you think you can get this platform alive?

comments.author: SnoopApe
comments.body: Quote from: AmoreJaz on August 03, 2022, 10:58:58 PMas you have a lot of competitors in this chosen industry, do you think you can still get sufficient clients to survive in this competitive market? nft, staking, dapps >> basically everyone is deploying these features. and let's admit, only few will survive to achieve years of operation. how long do you think you can get this platform alive?If we talk from the perspective of tokens, everyone is now launching tokens.But our key is to be able to have a sustainable ecosystem, based on the fundamental basis of having everything ready before launch (see, for example, our dashboard).But how many launch projects and need dApps ? So many.How many have the skills to develop dApps ? Few, and need external dev plus alot of money for developIs there any project that has some kind of launchpad with one-stop solution to get sources for launch their dapps ? None Well, is this SnoopApe's future directionQuoteWhat other long-term benefits after launch?One of our future direction now is to provide a one-stop solution for upcoming ERC20 projects.We are in the midst of developing a sort of launchpad which enables new projects to integrate functionssuch as Staking, NFT Minting or NFT Staking seamlessly and effortlessly into their existing project ecosystemwhere they would be able to receive a ready-to-use source codes (generic or customized version) to be integrated into their website.

comments.author: terciduk123
comments.body: I quote this from your site :"Our staking platform is also designed to earn passive income in USDC from SnoopApe's daily trading volume."This sounds very interesting, although many previous projects have offered the same thing with different awards. But the problem in general is that when your token has a low transaction volume, you will also only get a small amount of USDC to share, and when the trading volume decreases you don't have enough USDC to share. do you have a solution for this?

comments.author: SnoopApe
comments.body: Quote from: terciduk123 on August 05, 2022, 02:43:52 AMI quote this from your site :"Our staking platform is also designed to earn passive income in USDC from SnoopApe's daily trading volume."This sounds very interesting, although many previous projects have offered the same thing with different awards. But the problem in general is that when your token has a low transaction volume, you will also only get a small amount of USDC to share, and when the trading volume decreases you don't have enough USDC to share. do you have a solution for this?Well it is clear that the USDC reward is linked to the trading volume.In all cases, even when the volume is low, the USDC are accumulated in the contract, and then distributed to the holders as soon as the threshold is reached.There is always the possibility for holders to perform a forced autoclaim from our dashboard or bscscan

comments.author: terciduk123
comments.body: Quote from: SnoopApe on August 05, 2022, 08:26:18 AMQuote from: terciduk123 on August 05, 2022, 02:43:52 AMI quote this from your site :"Our staking platform is also designed to earn passive income in USDC from SnoopApe's daily trading volume."This sounds very interesting, although many previous projects have offered the same thing with different awards. But the problem in general is that when your token has a low transaction volume, you will also only get a small amount of USDC to share, and when the trading volume decreases you don't have enough USDC to share. do you have a solution for this?Well it is clear that the USDC reward is linked to the trading volume.In all cases, even when the volume is low, the USDC are accumulated in the contract, and then distributed to the holders as soon as the threshold is reached.There is always the possibility for holders to perform a forced autoclaim from our dashboard or bscscanThe team needs something that makes traders interested in trading your tokens on the market, otherwise you might find it difficult to share the USDC you earn from fees.Then what will the user get if he stakes NFT and how is it calculated?
